value.title: Incremental refresh for free in Power BI
value.excerpt: As you probably are aware, incremental refresh is a premium feature only, but with some DAX magic, you can get incremental refresh for free on Desktop and service!! Watch the video to learn how.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about

value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.
value.excerpt: There are no Insert functions ( that I know about) in the power query user interface, so if you dont know M, you probably have to create a new column to insert text in power query.  In today's video, I will show you how you can use power query user interface, to insert text into a column without adding

value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Power BI Trick and Tip. During this #Shorts we will learn how we can add an Average Line to our Power BI Graph. value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to

value.title: Handling deletes within Incremental Refresh in Power BI

Patrick has a great technique you can use to not only handle deletes, but also more easily handle updates with your partitions.
